title: TV on the Radio Add 2025 European Tour Dates
description: Concerts in Greece, Switzerland, Germany, Austria, and England accompany a spate of festival stops
author: Matthew Strauss
excerpt: Concerts in Greece, Switzerland, Germany, Austria, and England accompany a spate of festival stops
text: TV on the Radio reunited last year for their first shows since 2019. The concerts took place in New York, Los Angeles, and London. Now, they’ve announced more European tour dates to go with a spate of previously announced festival stops. The newly announced shows take place in Athens, Greece; Lausanne, Switzerland; Berlin, Germany; Vienna, Austria; and Manchester, England. See all of TV on the Radio’s tour dates below.TV on the Radio are going to be busy on the festival circuit this spring and summer, as they’re playing Just Like Heaven, Primavera Sound, Glastonbury, and more. They’ve not dropped a new album since 2014’s Seeds, but, this past autumn, they did reissue their 2004 debut, Desperate Youth, Blood Thirsty Babes, for its 20th anniversary.Tunde Adebimpe, the lead singer of TV on the Radio, is getting ready to release a new solo album. Thee Black Boltz is out April 18, and it includes the songs “Magnetic,” “Drop,” and “God Knows.”All products featured on Pitchfork are independently selected by our editors. However, when you buy something through our retail links, we may earn an affiliate commission.TV on the Radio Tour DatesTV on the Radio:05-10 Pasadena, CA - Just Like Heaven05-18 Salt Lake City, UT - Kilby Block Party06-05 Zurich, Switzerland - Unique Moments06-06 Barcelona, Spain - Primavera Sound Barcelona06-08 Athens, Greece - Lycabettus Hill Theater06-11 Lausanne, Switzerland - Docks06-13 Porto, Portugal - Primavera Sound Porto06-14 Hilvarenbeek, Netherlands - Best Kept Secret06-15 Wicklow, Ireland - Beyond the Pale Festival06-17 Berlin, Germany - Astra06-20 Katowice, Poland - Tauron Nowa Muzyka06-22 Lido di Camaiore, Italy - La Prima Estate06-25 Vienna, Austria - Gasometer06-27 Manchester, England - Albert Hall06-28 Sommerset, England - Glastonbury08-02 Montreal, Quebec - Osheaga08-15 London, England - Gunnersbury Park08-17 Crickhowell, Wales- Green Man Festival09-11 Louisville, KY - Bourbon & Beyond09-14 Asbury Park, NJ - Sea.Hear.Now 202509-20 Atlanta, GA - Shaky Knees Festival
html:
TV on the Radio reunited last year for their first shows since 2019. The concerts took place in New York, Los Angeles, and London. Now, they’ve announced more European tour dates to go with a spate of previously announced festival stops. The newly announced shows take place in Athens, Greece; Lausanne, Switzerland; Berlin, Germany; Vienna, Austria; and Manchester, England. See all of TV on the Radio’s tour dates below.

TV on the Radio are going to be busy on the festival circuit this spring and summer, as they’re playing Just Like Heaven, Primavera Sound, Glastonbury, and more. They’ve not dropped a new album since 2014’s Seeds, but, this past autumn, they did reissue their 2004 debut, Desperate Youth, Blood Thirsty Babes, for its 20th anniversary.

Tunde Adebimpe, the lead singer of TV on the Radio, is getting ready to release a new solo album. Thee Black Boltz is out April 18, and it includes the songs “Magnetic,” “Drop,” and “God Knows.”

All products featured on Pitchfork are independently selected by our editors. However, when you buy something through our retail links, we may earn an affiliate commission.

TV on the Radio Tour Dates

TV on the Radio:

05-10 Pasadena, CA - Just Like Heaven
05-18 Salt Lake City, UT - Kilby Block Party
